Parse.note:
The following administrative modes are available:
RefreshAppData
RegressionTest

HowTo.note:
Modify the AdminMode setting
Open the Web.Config file located in the root directory of the Tingen Web Service.
Locate the AvtrSys setting within the applicationSettings section.
Change the value of the AdminMode setting to the desired value.
Save the changes to the Web.Config file.
For example, to set the AdminMode to `RegressionTest`:
<setting name="AdminMode" serializeAs="String"> <value>RegressionTest</value> </setting>
Changes to the AdminMode setting will be applied the next time the Tingen Web Service is executed.
